title: League just died mid game
body: was just playing a game and every in game got dced and now i cant rejoin, well goodbye account, it was nice playing league, RIP banhammer op

replies.body: you won't get banned I also had this problem earlier its because they did a live patch/maintenance so the servers do go a bit funny sometimes
